document.full_text: viking, the publisher of "three cups of tea," said in a statement on monday that it will review the book and its contents with the author, greg mortenson.
document.title: publisher of 'three cups of tea' to conduct review
lines_and_colors: viking, the publisher of "three cups of tea," said in a statement on monday that it will review the book and its contents with the author, greg mortenson.
